TitleEnglish: I'll Become a Villainess Who Goes Down in History
SummaryEnglish: This young girl hates all those goodie-two-shoes heroines. So when she’s reincarnated as Alicia, the villain in her favorite fantasy dating sim, it’s like a dream come true! There’s just one problem: the more she tries to be evil, the more the prince seems to fall for her. Alicia will have to work much harder if she ever wants to become the world’s greatest villainess.
Aliases: 歴史に残る悪女になるぞ 悪役令嬢になるほど王子の溺愛は加速するようです！
Rekishi ni Nokoru Akujo ni Naru zo: Akuyaku Reijō ni Naru hodo Ōji no Dekiai wa Kasoku suru yō desu!
Rekishi ni Nokoru Akujo ni Naru zo: Akuyaku Reijou ni Naru hodo Ouji no Dekiai wa Kasoku suru you desu!
I'll Become a Villainess That Will Go Down in History: The More of a Villainess I Become, the More the Prince Will Dote on Me

1.SummaryEnglish: "Without effort, there's no reward! This applies to aspiring villainesses as well. With that in mind, Alicia wants to train not only her mind but also her body from a young age. Because only then can she ultimately come closer to her ideal."

2.SummaryEnglish: Believing that actual experience is just as crucial as book smarts if she wants to be the greatest villainess ever, Alicia heads to the village of Loana, which is isolated by a magic barrier. There, she has an encounter that changes her life...

3.SummaryEnglish: Alicia sets off on a major exploration at the magic school. There, she encounters her fiercest rival: the heroine!

4.TitleEnglish: The Villainess and the Flower Field
4.SummaryEnglish: Recognizing Alicia's talents, Luke asks her to become the watcher of Liz, who is likely the Saint. Alicia sees it as a chance to become the heroine's rival and agrees. She enters the Academy as a special exception, but finds herself in enemy territory...

5.TitleEnglish: The Villainess and the Villainess Test
5.SummaryEnglish: Alicia has made her stunning debut as a villainess at the Magic Academy. Just as everyone is starting to hate her, she receives an invitation to a tea party hosted by the king, and realizes that it corresponds to an event in the game...

6.TitleEnglish: The Villainess and Sleeping Side by Side
6.SummaryEnglish: Alicia falls into a trap and ends up in danger. She tries to escape on her own, but the arrival of an unexpected savior leaves her in an entirely new dilemma.

7.TitleEnglish: The Villainess Sits This One Out
7.SummaryEnglish: Alicia promises her father that she'll meet his condition of getting her magic to level 90 so she can continue to be Liz's watcher. She secludes herself in a tiny shed to train, and all the while, Gill awaits her return.

8.SummaryEnglish: Her training complete, Alicia is now fifteen years old and quite beautiful, and with stronger magic than ever. She immediately heads to the village of Roana and makes a move that shocks everyone...

9.TitleEnglish: The Villainess and the Dramatic Chin Lift
9.SummaryEnglish: Alicia is flustered after her knee-jerk reaction to Duke's strong feelings led to her coldly brushing him off. After giving further thought to what Duke means to her, Alicia decides to take action in true villainess style.

10.SummaryEnglish: Will tells Alicia and all the villagers of Roana about his own past, describing the scheme he fell victim to and the regrets it left him with. Then Alicia returns to the academy and quickly becomes tangled up in yet another plot...

11.TitleEnglish: The Villainess and the School Idol
11.SummaryEnglish: Alicia becomes interested in the neighboring nation of Laval. In order to be a villainess who goes down in history, she knows she needs to learn more about the world outside the game's script, but it won't be easy...

12.SummaryEnglish: Mel's diligent investigation has revealed the Saint's secret, and it plays a big role in the academy's current state of affairs. To guide the Saint down the correct path as her watcher, Alicia the villainess finally confronts Liz the heroine.

13.SummaryEnglish: Duke coldly asks Alicia, "Who are you?" It seems like someone has cast magic on him that erased his memories of her... and Alicia is the top suspect. What will become of her?
